attributes.action: Stop using that new 'black' salt on the roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: motorists might have noticed this winter their cars are somewhat dirtier than last year. it appears that they have stopped using the usual 'orange' road salt and switched to a lower budget 'black' salt that actually makes matters worse, the road becomes greasy, it also cakes the car in grim causing the headlights to be deemed useless and numberplates unreadable. its also a right pain cleaning the windscreen every 4 seconds are the car in general every evening to keep some visibility on the roads!
